Name: HydraGlow Cleanser
Description: A gentle, pH-balanced foaming cleanser with aloe vera and green tea extract to cleanse without stripping the skin.

Name: Vitamin C Serum
Description: Brighten and even skin tone with 15% stabilized vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and licorice root extract.

Name: SPF 30 Moisturizer
Description: Lightweight broad-spectrum moisturizer with SPF 30 and niacinamide, suitable for daily use.

Name: Retinol Night Serum
Description: A lightweight retinol serum infused with peptides and ceramides to refine texture and boost skin renewal overnight.

Name: UltraHydrate Serum
Description: Deep hydration booster serum with triple-weight hyaluronic acid for plump, refreshed skin.

Name: Green Clay Mask
Description: Detoxifying clay mask with green tea and kaolin to absorb excess oil and reduce breakouts.

Name: Peptide Eye Cream
Description: Soothing under-eye cream with peptides, caffeine, and vitamin K to reduce puffiness and dark circles.

Name: Rosewater Toner
Description: Hydrating facial mist with rosewater and witch hazel to refresh and prep skin for serums.

Name: Exfoliating Scrub
Description: A creamy exfoliant with jojoba beads and fruit enzymes to polish dead skin cells away.

Name: Aloe Recovery Gel
Description: Calming post-sun gel with aloe vera, chamomile, and panthenol for irritated skin.

Name: Green Tea Serum
Description: Antioxidant-rich serum that defends against pollution and environmental stressors.

Name: Hydration Sleep Mask
Description: Sleeping mask packed with squalane and shea butter for a deep moisture barrier boost.

Name: Niacinamide Serum
Description: Concentrated niacinamide formula for clearer, smoother, and more balanced skin.

Name: BHA Pore Toner
Description: Exfoliating toner with 2% salicylic acid to clear pores and prevent blackheads.

Name: Cream Cleanser
Description: Non-foaming cleanser with glycerin and oat extract ideal for dry or sensitive skin.

Name: Matte Moisturizer
Description: Shine-controlling daily moisturizer with zinc PCA and niacinamide for oily skin types.

Name: GlowBoost Vitamin E Oil
Description: Luxurious facial oil with vitamin E and jojoba for glow and elasticity.
